casebody.data:
[Grafton,

June, 1880.] Greeley & a. v. Bagley. Burleigh Sf Adams, for the plaintiffs. Burrows Sf Jewell, for the defendant.

Trespass, qu. cl. Report of a referee in favor of the plaintiffs. The location of a disputed boundary being found by the referee, and no error of law appearing in his finding, judgment was rendered on his report.

Allen, J., did not sit: the others concurred.
